data.title: Red Diesel Fuel Supplier in Scotland
data.meta_description: Looking for a Reliable Red Diesel Fuel Supplier in Scotland? Crown Oil Deliver Red Diesel Nationwide. Click to learn more
data.text:
Looking for a reliable red diesel delivery company in Scotland?

If you need red diesel delivered to you anywhere in Scotland and surrounding areas, Crown Oil can supply your business with a range of fuels, oils and lubricants within 24-48 hours…

With depots located in the region and a fleet of tankers that can deliver anything from 205-litre barrels to 36,000-litre (and more) bulk deliveries, there’s no need to look anywhere else for your fuel needs.

We have been delivering red diesel for over 75 years to businesses across the country. Some of the industries we deliver to include:

Rail transport

Community amateur sports clubs and golf courses

Sailing, boating and marine transport (excluding private pleasure craft in Northern Ireland)

Travelling fairs and circuses

Fuel used for non-commercial purposes – electricity generation and heating

Agriculture, horticulture, fish farming and forestry

Whether you need to order red diesel or are just looking around for prices, call our red diesel experts on 0330 123 1444 and we will do our best to fulfil your requirements.

Deliveries made on the same day or next day basis

Here at Crown Oil, our fuel tankers have been supplying fuels and oils to businesses for over 70 years. Our network of oil depots enables us to deliver red diesel nationwide to businesses all across Scotland and the rest of the UK. We are able to provide our customers with a same-day delivery service to locations across the Highlands from one of our many oil depots.

So if you’re looking for a supplier who can meet your needs and understands the importance of getting urgent red diesel deliveries out to your business. Our expert team here at Crown Oil will be happy to help ensure your fuel deliveries are made on time when you need them. Give us a call today on 0330 123 1444 to learn more.

Do you plan to use red diesel as heating oil?

Red diesel is no longer permitted to be used as a commercial heating fuel as of the 1st of April 2022. Industrial heating oil (IHO) is not affected by the duty changes and is a cost-effective fuel that has been formulated specifically for heating.

IHO is strictly prohibited for use in any vehicle, be it for on-road or off-road vehicles, as well any other mobile or static engines.

For heating oil applications, please refer to our heating oil and industrial heating oil product information pages.

We can supply a wide range of fuels and oils

Crown Oil is a fuel supplier that delivers our range of fuels, oils and lubricants nationwide. No matter where in Scotland you are located, our fleet will deliver our fuels to you when you need them. Choose Crown Oil for:

Choose Crown Oil to supply you with:

Red diesel

White diesel (DERV)

HVO Fuel

Home heating oil

Industrial heating oil (IHO)

Kerosene

Lubricants

And many more…

Our Fuel services also include:

24/7 emergency fuel delivery

Fuel management

Priority fuel contracts

Bulk delivery

205-litre barrel delivery

Environmental services

We can supply a wide range of fuels and oils

Crown Oil is a fuel supplier that delivers our range of fuels, oils and lubricants nationwide. No matter where in Scotland you are located, our fleet will deliver our fuels to you when you need them. Choose Crown Oil for:

With Crown Oil, you can be sure you’re choosing a fuel supplier with proven experience, reliability and capacity to meet your fuel and oil requirements.

For your red diesel requirements across Scotland, contact our red diesel experts on 0330 123 1444 today for a quote with our latest fuel prices.
